name: CodingCoach
0:
”Alexa, open Coding Coach”
”Start coding”
”Skip the problem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coding coach
des:
News: 
We are updating our problem database. Keep come back to try new problems.

Descriptions:
You will interact with the Coding Coach to practice a coding interview.
Coding Coach first gives you a coding problem to solve. 
You can work on the problem on a piece of paper or a whiteboard.
During the practice, you can say "show me a hint" to Alexa to show the hint of the problem

When you are finished with a practice, you can say “I’m finished” to end the practice.
You can also ask for the follow-up question or the solutions.

Finally, you can say "start over" or "skip" to practice the next problem.

Example Phrases: 
"Start coding": start the practice
"Skip the problem": skip the current problem
"Show me the hints": reveal the hints. Each problem has unique hints.
"I finished": To end the practice, you can ask for follow up questions and solutions later.
"Show me the follow-up questions": Reveal the unique follow up questions to the problem.
"Show me the solution": Reveal the unique solution to the problem. The solution gives you the idea of how to approach the problem.
"Start over": To start the new practice.
